items.title: Accounts and Integration Developer at BigChange Apps Ltd (Leeds, UK) (allows remote)
items.content:
About this job

Job type: Permanent
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Industry: CRM, SaaS, Vehicle Tracking
Company size: 11-50 people
Company type: Private

Job description

Technologies

.net c# AWS SQL Server

Job Description

We are looking for a skilled developer who wants to be part of a growing company where they can design and deliver great, high quality, innovative software. This doesn't mean you have been working on the industry for years and years - just that you're really good at your job.

Profile

  • Loves writing code to solve problems
  • Interested in the latest developments in .NET and development in general
  • Flexible enough to get requirements from customers and see it all the way through to release
  • Open minded about approach or the technology to use for each problem
  • Wants to work with the latest cloud based solutions
  • Deep knowledge of C#, SQL,
  • Preferably experience of cloud solutions, mobile, Big Data (and probably lots more)
  • Eager to share knowledge with the rest of the small, dedicated but geographically diverse team
  • Accounting integration experience, preferably with Sage 50 / 200 / Xero / Quickbooks and more

Advantages

  • Flexible working hours
  • The convenience of working from home (but feel free to come to the office anytime you want)
  • Working with the latest releases 
  • The chance to influence our next steps and build something really different
  • New diverse challenges regularly
  • Anything else: just ask!

About BigChange Apps Ltd

  • BigChange are a UK based technology company specialising in Mobile Resource Management Software. We have developed in-house a SAAS system that enables businesses to improve operational efficiency and all paperwork from field operations.
  • We are growing by 80% year on year and have plans to grow globally in 2018
  • Our Founder and CEO is an Entrepreneur who values providing excellent service to our customers
  • We have a fantastic product… No honestly it’s brilliant.
  • Our customers love us

About BigChange Apps Ltd

About BigChange Apps Ltd

  • BigChange are a UK based technology company specialising in Mobile Resource Management Software. We have developed in-house a SAAS system that enables businesses to improve operational efficiency and all paperwork from field operations.
  • We are growing by 80% year on year and have plans to grow globally in 2018
  • Our Founder and CEO is an Entrepreneur who values providing excellent service to our customers
  • We have a fantastic product… No honestly it’s brilliant.
  • Our customers love us

Benefits

Work from Home
Flexible time
Family culture
Latest technology
